item.title: Flutter - BottomNavigationBar
item.description: Flutter import 'package:flutter/foundation.dart' as foundation; import 'package:flutter/cupertino.dart'; import 'package:flutter/material.dart'; import 'package:good_choice/search.dart'; import 'package:good_choice/settings/settings.dart'; import 'package:shared_preferences/shared_preferences.dart'; bool get iOS => foundation.defaultTargetPlatform == foundation.TargetPlatform.iOS; void main() => runApp(App()); class App extends StatelessWidget { // This widget is the root of your application. @override Widget build(BuildContext context) { if (iOS) { // iOS return CupertinoApp( title: 'Good Choice', theme: CupertinoThemeData( primaryColor: CupertinoColors.destructiveRed, barBackgroundColor: CupertinoColors.extraLightBackgroundGray, ), home: HomePage(title: 'Cupertino App'), ); } else { // Android return MaterialApp( title: 'Good Choice', theme: ThemeData( primaryColor: Colors.
